Info.Title: The Warlords
Info.Director: Peter Ho-Sun Chan, Wai Man Yip(co-director)
Info.Writer: Tin Nam Chun (screenplay), Junli Guo (screenplay), Jiping He (screenplay), Jianxin Huang (screenplay), Yuet-Jan Hui (screenplay), Oi Wah Lam (screenplay), Lan Xu (screenplay), James Yuen (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Jet Li, Andy Lau, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Jinglei Xu
Info.Plot: Set in China in the 1860's during the Taiping Rebellion, the story is based on the assassination of Ma Xinyi in 1870. Loyalist General Qingyun is the only survivor of a battle with ...
Info.Country: Hong Kong, China, British Virgin Islands
